means: 努力争取(for)( labor的过去式和过去分词 )

sentence.Network_en: I was close enough to the elk to hear its labored breathing.
sentence.Network_cn: 我离那头麋鹿非常近，能听见它吃力的呼吸声。

sentence.Network_en: They have labored to complete the job.
sentence.Network_cn: 他们努力完成这一工作。

sentence.Network_en: They labored under the disadvantage of not having enough money.
sentence.Network_cn: 他们苦于得不到足够的资金.

stems_affixes.word_buile: labor劳动+ed……的→被劳动出来的→费力的
labor劳动+atory场所→劳动的地方→实验室
